Yiner in Python

Python字符串转化为时间

import time
import datetime

def string2datetime(day, method=datetime.datetime, format='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'):
    return method.fromtimestamp(time.mktime(time.strptime(day, format)))

string2datetime('2013-12-12',datetime.date, '%Y-%m-%d')
